title: mADabArade
sahitya:
mADabArade maddu mAyAdEvi mADabArade


caraNam 1    karagaLindali hariya mandirada kasava tegeyOdakke niratadalli bEsarade haruSa puTTO hAge
    caraNam 2    shruti rAmAyaNa shrI bhAgavata panca rAtrAgadai kathegaLIsi bahaLa ratiyu puTTO hAge
    caraNam 3    dEhavu anityavendu mOhadindali pOSisadale mahEndrAvarajana aharaha bhajisO hAge
    caraNam 4    sante neredante strI putrarentemboru aridu kantupitana caraNa svAntadi smarisO hAge
    caraNam 5    manO vAkkAyagaLindali sadguNadi purandara viTTalana anurAgAdi pADi kuNidu kuNidu daNiyO hAge
